textBeforeTable: Scouting Audibles Bio Videos Statistics Updates After starting 48 games for the Buffs, Ryan Miller is headed to the NFL to play for the Cleveland Browns.[details] The Latest: Miller selected by the Browns — 4/28/2012   Michael Adkins Cade Apsay Vincent Ariva Jaleel Awini Chidobe Awuzie Jered Bell Brian Boatman Bryce Bobo Ed Caldwell Shane Callahan Jordan Carrell Connor Center Timothy Coleman Lance Cottrell Kenneth Crawley Connor Darby Elijah Dunston Kyle Evans Shay Fields John Finch Will Fischer-Colbrie Jase Franke George Frazier Rick Gamboa Ty Gangi Jordan Gehrke Jimmie Gilbert Addison Gillam Diego Gonzalez Chris Graham Garrett Gregory Devyn Grimes Joseph Hall Terran Hasselbach Tyler Henington Chris Hill Aaron Howard Jonathan Huckins Jeromy Irwin Sean Irwin Leo Jackson Colin Johnson Hayden Jones Samson Kafovalu Josh Kaiser
